General.Name: China Merchants Shekou Industrial Zone Holdings
General.Description: China Merchants Shekou Industrial Zone Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the development of residential and commercial properties, asset operation, and urban service business worldwide. It is involved in operation and management of industrial parks, offices, hotels, apartments, etc.; and property management, cruise ships, exhibitions, health care and other business. The company was formerly known as China Merchants Shekou Industrial Zone Company Limited. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China. China Merchants Shekou Industrial Zone Holdings Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Merchants Group Limited.
